title: What I Do?
items: 2D Visualization & 3D Visualization: Developing cutting-edge technology visualizations in both two and three dimensions.
AR Simulation & VR Simulation: Developing AR and VR applications to simulate complex and novel technological ideas.
Feature Implementation: Designing and implementing innovative features for passion-driven game projects.
Reusable Tooling: Building reusable Unity tools to shorten development time.

title: Programming Languages
items: Unity Engine & C# Development: Developed a wide range of games and applications with Unity and C# for Windows & Mac.
C++ OOP: Built applications using C++, focusing on object-oriented programming and efficient code practices.
Swift (Vision Pro): Created an AR application for Apple Vision Pro utilizing Swift, enhancing user interaction through innovative software and hardware integration.

title: Video & Audio Editing
items: Audio Signal Processing (Max 8): Engineered complex audio signal processing pipelines for custom hardware using Max 8, ensuring precision and efficiency.
Demo Video Editing: Edited moonshot demo videos with custom software and hardware, delivering high-impact visual presentations.
Clipchamp & CapCut Video Editing: Experienced in video editing with Clipchamp and Capcut, producing high-quality content.
